node.excerpt: Dr. Mohammad Saleh completed his residency in endocrinology and metabolism then geriatric fellowship at Wayne State University in Detroit, Michigan. Dr.Saleh is American Board certified in Endocrinology and Metabolism. Dr. Saleh is also a fellow of the American College of Endocrinology Dr. Saleh is a consulting attending physician at Beaumont Dearborn Hospital and is the author of several articles…
“Go above and beyond to create positive patient experience and stay committed in everything we do”
